name: Green Launch
description:
Green Launch is a short, action-packed platformer in which you run a computer simulation that takes you into an alternate reality where the world has been devastated by the impacts that humans had on the environment. You'll have to overcome the challenges of the alternate world to find out what needs to be done to prevent the same fate befalling the real one.

Green Launch has also been nominated for the 2019 BAFTA Young Game Designers Game Making Award (15-18 years).

Features

  • 16 vibrant platforming challenge levels
  • A variety of environment-themed hazards, such as acid rain, oil spills, melting ice caps and rising sea levels
  • Unique Solar Launch Pads game mechanic
  • Educational value about protecting the environment

System Requirements

Barely any.

Controls

Arrow keys to move, and Z and X to interact with Solar Launch Pads.

Downloadable Game

Green Launch (made in Unity) is also available for download on my GitHub at this link.
